alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN WEST BATON ROUGE, WEST CENTRAL LIVINGSTON, EAST CENTRAL IBERVILLE AND SOUTH CENTRAL EAST BATON ROUGE PARISHES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westminster, or over Oak Hills Place, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Merrydale, Village St. George, Inniswold, Shenandoah, and Gardere. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 157 and 168. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; West Baton Rouge
